title: Baahubali: The Beginning
description: A man destined for greatness uncovers his royal lineage and seeks revenge.

title: Baahubali: The Conclusion
description: The son of a fallen prince returns to claim his rightful place in Mahishmati.

title: Geetha Govindam
description: A young lecturer tries to win over a woman who mistakenly perceives him as a flirt.

title: Athadu
description: An assassin on the run finds himself entangled with a family that mistakes him for their lost son.

title: Pokiri
description: An undercover cop infiltrates the mafia and fights to eliminate crime.

title: Magadheera
description: Reincarnation brings two lovers together, bound by a centuries-old bond.

title: Srimanthudu
description: A billionaire adopts a village and fights to improve the lives of its people.

title: Bharat Ane Nenu
description: An NRI reluctantly becomes chief minister and vows to reform his state.

title: Rangasthalam
description: A hearing-impaired villager stands up against a corrupt leader.

title: Arya
description: A young man pursues his love interest, showcasing the power of pure love.
